name: Watermelon Glow PHA +BHA Pore-Tight Toner

Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

What Else You Need to Know:

Suitable for all skin types, this bouncy, alcohol-free toner is made with PHA and willow bark, a natural form of BHA, to help unclog pores while hydrating skin. Combined with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and cactus water, it smooths without stripping skin of its moisture, for poreless, glowing skin. Due to cactus water and cucumber in the formula, scent is herbal with a fruity finish.

- 90% of subjects saw a significant reduction in pore size

Candeia Tree Extract is a conditioning plant extract that soothes and improves the appearance of damaged skin by allowing it to hold on to moisture. name: SKINPOWER Essence Serum
about the product: A concentrated serum that fights visible signs of aging and supercharges your skin for a pore-less, bouncy appearance.
Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

- Pitera™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids to condition skin's natural functions.

- InfinitPower Technology: An exclusive cocktail of power ingredients formulated with calla lily extract, dokudami extract, and peony extract to charge the power source of skin to visibly plump up from within.
What Else You Need to Know:

With a specially designed auto-dropper, just one powerful drop is the optimal dosage for each application. The concentrated formula with InfinitPower Technology visibly plumps skin from within, restoring visible bounciness and suppleness.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

name: Gold Camellia Beauty Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A multitasking beauty oil with 23-karat gold for face, hair, and body that adds instant nourishment and radiance to your skincare and makeup routine.
If you want to know more…

This soothing oil is made from the extra extra virgin Japanese camellia that grow on the Goto Islands. The seeds are cold-pressed to extract the essential oil and retain its full benefits. This oil is naturally rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids to nourish and help seal in moisture. It absorbs quickly and thoroughly because its molecular weight is an almost identical match for skin. Crushed 23-karat gold flakes leave a subtle gleam on skin, and Infused licorice extract gently calms and helps to reduce visible redness. Hadasei-3 Complex, Tatcha’s proprietary trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoods—green tea, rice, and algae—visibly restores healthy-looking, youthful radiance.
What else you need to know:

For 2,000 years, camellia oil has been treasured by geisha and Japanese women because of how it nourishes skin, leaving it glowing but never oily. They learned of its incredible benefits from Ama, Japanese female free divers who spend four hours a day, every day harvesting treasures from the sea wearing only a loin cloth. To protect their skin and hair from the salty, cold ocean water, they coat their skin with camellia oil. This beauty secret has been advanced for the lips by the Tatcha Institute in Japan with the Gold Camellia Beauty Oil.
This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
ingredients: -Japanese Camellia Oil (Tsubaki): Seals in moisture and nourishes with of Vitamins A, B, D and E and nourishing Omegas 3, 6, and 9; this featherweight botanical oil is richer in oleic acid than olive oil.

CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

A non-nano 100 percent mineral lightweight moisturizer that delivers broad-spectrum protection and lightweight hydration—perfect for sensitive, oily, and acne-prone skin.


Skin Type: 
Normal, Combination, and Oily 

Skincare Concerns: 
Oiliness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes

Formulation: 
Lotion

- Non-nano Zinc Oxide: Absorbs UVB rays and reflects UVA rays, and is made of mineral particles that are larger in size and safely sit on top of skin.
- Winter Cherry: Helps protect the skin from the damaging effects of atmospheric pollution and blue light emitted from phones and computer screens.
- Blueberry: Helps protect the skin from infrared-induced free radical damage which causes the appearance of aging.

 Ingredient Callouts: 
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and reef safe.

This blendable zinc oxide formula helps protect your skin from UV rays, blue light, infrared radiation, and pollution. Plus, the skin-brightening pink tint masks mineral actives (reducing the white cast and flashback that's typical of most mineral SPF) and wears well under makeup.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A 24-hour, light-textured daily hydrator with SPF 30.
If you want to know more…

Inspired by their beloved "Greenland First Ascent" Ultra Facial Cream, Kiehl’s created this daily, light-textured, 24-hour, moisturizer that leaves skin feeling balanced, comfortable, and hydrated. The formula also helps protect against skin-damaging UVA and UVB rays with broad spectrum SPF 30. Formulated with Antarcticine®, a Glycoprotein known to withstand extreme cold, and fountain plant, notable for its ability to help skin maintain its natural moisture reserves, this superb moisturizer leaves skin soft, smooth, and healthy-looking.
What else you need to know:

Through Ultra Facial Cream, Kiehl’s was honored to lend support and protection from the elements to the heroic team of the "Greenland First Ascent" expedition. The six explorers completed the first-ever ascent of Greenland’s ice covered peaks on May 30, 2005.

Kiehl’s is inspired by its rich heritage as an old-world apothecary, applying over 165 years’ worth of cosmetic, pharmaceutical, herbal, and medicinal knowledge into the formulations. They utilize the finest natural ingredients and incorporate advanced scientific technologies to ensure the highest quality and most efficacious formulas without compromise. They are protective of the environment as they maximize the use of renewable, sustainable, and biodegradable ingredients. Kiehl’s proudly stands behind the quality, efficacy, and safety of each of their products.

name: Benefiance NutriPerfect Night Cream
about the product: A high performance nighttime recover cream created especially for mature skin.
What it is formulated to do:

Carnosine, the oxidation fighting peptide found in muscle tissue helps extend the life of cells by boosting defense mechanisms against free radicals.  With Carnosine DP ™ combined with multivitamin B, C, E and P, a powerful nutritive supplement, Benefiance NutriPerfect intensively fortifies skin.  It restores skin density and firmness for younger-looking facial contours and intensively renews skin's vitality while you sleep, plus it is scented with a comforting fragrance to promote relaxation.
What else you need to know:

The hormonal changes that come with age undermine the skin's ability to bounce back—which shows in the form of wrinkles and sagging as skin weakens.  Benefiance NutriPerfect was created specifically for women ages 50 and over who are facing these menopause-related hormonal changes and are concerned about the weakening and thinning of their skin.

name: Ceramidin™ Liquid
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A lightweight moisturizing toner that leaves skin supple, moisturized, and ready to absorb the next products in your regimen.
If you want to know more…

This toner is now supercharged with 5-cera complex which leaves skin supple and moisturized. It also features panthenol, a calming complex of fig, centella asiatica, and phyto extracts which relieves cracked or flaky skin. This toner is for those who have dry, flaky, and rough-textured skin.
What else you need to know:

Ceramides are our skin’s natural protection barrier. They are composed of intercellular lipids that act as skin’s defense against environmental aggressors and maintain moisture levels. Think of your skin as a brick wall: when it is first built, it is strong and sturdy. Over time, it needs fortification to remain strong. As we age, we lose ceramides, leading to a decrease in elasticity and moisture.
ingredients: -5-Cera Complex: Deeply moisturizes and strengthens skin.
-Panthenol: Relieves cracked or flaky skin.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An all-in-one skin-perfecting night cream made with a natural retinol alternative to deeply hydrate and target fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots.
If you want to know more…

Say "hello results, goodbye retinol" with bakuchiol, a plant-based retinol alternative. At night, your skin goes into repair mode. This rich sleeping cream makes the most of that time, exfoliating the skin’s surface to allow fresher skin to glow through. Formulated with a powerful concentration of AHAs and bakuchiol—a natural alternative to retinol—it fights all major signs of aging for an overnight skin transformation. It targets fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots. And, with edelweiss stem cell, a delicately beautiful and resilient flower that thrives in harsh conditions, this potent sleeping cream also helps visibly firm and improve elasticity. Deeply hydrate all night to face a new day with renewed skin—and a new Ole Glow®!
What else you need to know:

After a good night’s rest, your skin should look as refreshed as you feel. Ole created this potent transformative cream to be beauty sleep in a jar; by the time you say "good morning!" to your reflection, skin looks smoother, more youthful, and deeply hydrated. Ole was inspired by the dramatic age-fighting benefits retinol delivers, but wanted to find a natural alternative. He selected bakuchiol, derived from the Ayurvedic babchi herb, after learning that it delivers retinol-like youth-boosting benefits.

A cult-favorite among celebrities and makeup artists worldwide, the Beauty Elixir is the ideal setting spray between layers of makeup for a long-lasting and smooth finish. Perfect as an aftershave for men, the formula contains essential oils and plant extracts to clarify and brighten the complexion.

The therapeutic scent from the organic essential oils of mint, rose, and rosemary invigorate throughout the day. Spritz at the office during that lull for a quick pick-me-up, and in the evening to refresh your makeup so that it looks like you just applied it.

"I love Caudalie's Beauty Elixir. I especially like their little one to keep in my handbag—brilliant for traveling. It has quite a lot of essential oils in it, so what I like to do is spray it on my hands and rub them together, then breathe it in. It just smells so amazing and uplifting. And then, I just pat it on my skin. It freshens your makeup."—Lisa Eldridge, celebrity makeup artist

Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!

What Else You Need to Know:

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.
ingredients: -PITERA™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors; contains over 50 micro-nutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and organic acids to condition skin's natural functions.

name: Luna Retinol Sleeping Night Oil
about the product: A gentle, glow-giving retinoid night oil—perfect for new and experienced retinol users—that is balanced with blue tansy to calm skin while improving the look of wrinkles, redness, and pores.
Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Redness
- Retinoid Ester: This advanced retinoid ester fights the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, visibly supports natural skin elasticity, and helps even out the look of surface redness.
- Botanical Complex (Blue Tansy and German Chamomile): Soothes the appearance of surface redness.
- Cold-Pressed Chia and Blackberry Seed Oils: Nourish and minimize the appearance of fine lines.

Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.
What Else You Need to Know:

This oil works throughout the night to deliver luminous, visibly even-toned skin by morning. It is formulated with an ultra-stable, gentle retinol ester and a complex of lightweight but nutritious oils, which soothe the appearance of surface redness for a calm, visibly even-toned complexion. Retinoid ester is just as effective as traditional retinol while being much gentler to the skin, making it an ideal choice for people with sensitive skin or new users of retinol.
After an independent consumer-testing panel used Luna Retinol Sleeping Night Oil for 4 weeks:
- 100% felt the product absorbed well into the skin
- 96% of women felt their skin looked brighter and more radiant
- 96% of women felt their skin looked healthier and revitalized

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A daily support formula with 100 percent high-purity, sustainably-sourced, organic, cold-pressed rose hip seed oil.

This formulation uses 100 percent pure rosehip seed oil— rich in linoleic acid, linolenic acid, and pro-vitamin A—that is both cold-pressed and organic. This oil has been shown to reduce signs of photo-aging and many other skin conditions.

This product is vegan, cruelty-free, cold-pressed, organic, and formulated without water, alcohol, silicone, nuts, and gluten. name: Avocado Melt Retinol Eye Sleeping Mask
about the product: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

- Encapsulated Retinol: Helps to improve the look of uneven skin tone, and addresses the damage caused by daily exposure to pollutants and other free radicals; encapsulation of the retinol allows it to sit on the surface of the skin longer and release smaller amounts at a time, making it more gentle than traditional retinol treatments.

- Avocado: A nutrient-dense fruit rich in antioxidants such as vitamin E and vitamin C, which are known to fight wrinkles and environmental aggressors; contains both avocado oil and avocado extract for the ultimate soothing and nourishing.
- Coffeeberry: Packed with antioxidants, coffeeberry (the seed of the coffee plant) helps to revitalize, neutralize free radicals, and soothe.
This product is vegan and cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.
What Else You Need to Know:

Potent, encapsulated ingredients like retinol, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide time release throughout all hours of the night, while avocado hydrates and nourishes, and coffeeberry helps to brighten and depuff the delicate under-eye area. The result is brighter, smoother, more awake-looking eyes by morning. This product has been ophthalmologist tested and dermatologist tested.
In a consumer testing panel of 24 participants:
- 100% said their eye area felt more moisturized after 1 week of use
- 100% said dryness was less visible after 1 week of use
When you spot our Clean seal, you can be sure we’ve checked that this brand’s product is made without the ingredients you told us you’d most like to avoid.
Clean at Sephora™ is formulated without:

Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban. All skincare, hair, and makeup brands with the Clean Seal have less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

name: Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence)
about the product: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
- Pitera™: Contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and natural acids to condition skin.
Contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.
What Else You Need to Know:

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.
ingredients: -PITERA™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors; contains over 50 micro-nutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and organic acids to condition skin's natural functions.

name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
If you want to know more…

The Water Cream provides nutrient-rich, balanced hydration with the unique water-burst that breaks upon application to deliver nourishment without leaving skin sticky or greasy. It clarifies and refines skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals: Japanese wild rose visibly tightens pores and smooths skin texture; Japanese leopard lily helps control excess oil and purify skin by supporting natural skin turnover; and hadasei-3—an anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice, and algae—restores healthy-looking radiance. The formula imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.
What else you need to know:

Beauty icons for over 300 years, geisha adopted Japanese wild rose to create a refined, poreless-looking canvas underneath their makeup. The Water Cream has harnessed this potent botanical to honor the original makeup lover. This pure formula is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

name: No. 4 Vanilla Silk Hydrating Lotion
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A luxurious, lightweight day cream with natural SPF, AHAs, antioxidants, and a seductive vanilla scent.
If you want to know more…

This satiny smooth daytime lotion hydrates, visibly firms and plumps, and preps skin for flawless makeup application. Camellia seed oil, cocoa, and shea butters nourish skin with an active cocktail of vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids that smooth fine lines and wrinkles and protect against environmental damage. Native extracts (davidson plum and lemon aspen) along with vitamin E support elasticity, while black raspberry offers natural sun protection. Australian rosella extract—an excellent source of AHAs—helps support natural cellular turnover, improve moisturization, and encourage fresh, youthful-looking skin. The essence of pure vanilla extract subtly seduces the senses and enhances the luxurious experience.
What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

name: Snowflower Illuminating Face Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An antioxidant-rich cocktail of organic, superfood oils that leaves skin supple, luminous, and youthful-looking—without the greasy feel.
If you want to know more…

This youthful-boosting cocktail of wildcrafted, botanical oils absorbs quickly and penetrates deeply, infusing skin with a luminous vitality. Snowflower seed and kakadu plum oils are abundant in vitamin C to support natural collagen production and brighten the skin. Emu apple seed oil—which has four times the antioxidants of blueberries—lends its nourishing and rejuvenating abilities, while jjoba seed and banksia seed oil reduce redness and encourage suppleness.
What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

name: Premier Cru Anti-Aging Cream
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A master of all creams to brighten, visibly tighten and plump, smooth, and nourish in one luxurious step.
If you want to know more…

There’s cream, and then there’s Premier Cru Cream. The foundation of the entire Premier Cru line, it took seven years to perfect the elegant, naturally sourced, highly active formula. Referred to as the crème de la crème, it’s the ultimate one hit wonder to brighten, tighten, plump, smooth and nourish in one luxurious step. Caudalie’s clinically proven, powerhouse patents address all signs of aging: resveratrol lifts and firms, Viniferine® brightens and grape seed polyphenols protect against environmental aggressors. Plumping peptides help to support collagen synthesis, while naturally-sourced grape and sesame seed oils deeply nourish and hydrate. The cream’s buttery texture melts into the skin, leaving it well hydrated and velvety-smooth to the touch. There’s nothing quite like it; the results—a 98 percent reduction in wrinkles and a 98 percent increased firmness—speak for themselves.
What else you need to know:

Founded on their family vineyard in Bordeaux France, Mathilde and Bertrand Thomas created the first skincare brand to harness the natural antioxidant powers of the grapevine. Since the beginning, the 100 percent family-owned company has always sourced natural and environmentally conscious ingredients, while collaborating with leading medical schools such as Harvard Medical School. Each formula created is held to the highest of standards: natural, effective, and luxurious free of synthetic and harmful ingredients—with no animal testing. Caudalie never uses parabens, phenoxyethenol, phtalates, mineral oil, sodium laureth sulfate, or animal ingredients in their formulas.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An ultra-hydrating concentrate of botanical oils and extracts that melt into skin for a youthful-looking glow in as little as one night.
If you want to know more…

This night concentrate is the perfect evening companion to Tatcha's bestselling Luminous Dewy Skin Mist. Powered by red algae from the mineral-rich waters of Okinawa, it works overnight to hydrate and visibly plump away fine lines for glowing, dewy skin by morning. Seven rich botanical extracts—squalane from olive fruit, green tea, wild thyme, ginseng root, licorice root, sweet marjoram, and jujube fruit—work to improve skin tone, clarity, and texture. Hadasei-3™, Tatcha’s trinity of anti-aging Japanese superfoods green tea, rice, and algae restores a healthy-looking, youthful radiance. The unique formula is firm and bouncy to the touch, dissolving luxuriously into the skin for a smooth, sensuous application.
What else you need to know:

Off the southernmost tip of Japan’s mainland lies Okinawa, a collection of tropical islands famed for its white sand beaches, pristine waters, and inhabitants who have one of the world’s longest average lifespans. The precious red algae harvested there is called “treasure from the god of the sea,” and has long been prized for its moisture-retaining qualities. The Night Concentrate harnesses its gift of replenishing hydration for dewy skin by morning.

Luminous Dewy Skin Night Concentrate was previously known as the Luminous Overnight Memory Serum Concentrate. Tatcha has updated the name and packaging to better reflect that it is the perfect night companion to their Luminous Dewy Skin Mist. It is exactly the same beloved formula as before. This formula is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, cruelty-free, and formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

about the product:
What it is:

A moisturizer with breakthrough Telo-5™ technology that supports antiaging, targeting the appearance of wrinkles, fines lines, and the signs of aging.  

What it is formulated to do:

 As we age, fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, and sagging skin occur.  Age Arrest’s advanced formula is improves the appearance of skin’s firmness and elasticity, skin discoloration, while it significantly moisturizes skin.  Its revolutionary Telo-5™ Technology, based on Nobel Prize* winning research on the youthful benefits of prolonging the life of telomeres, is designed to reduce the signs of aging and deliver a rejuvenated, youthful-looking complexion. An integral third step in Kate Somerville’s three Steps to Glowing Skin, moisturizing is key to achieving glowing, radiant skin.

*Disclaimer: The Nobel Prize® is a registered trademark of the Nobel Foundation. The trademark holder is not affiliated with Kate Somerville and does not sponsor or endorse this product.

- Parabens

- 90% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin firmness and elasticity
- 93% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin discoloration and skin tone evenness

After 6 weeks:

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A multi-action oil that infuses skin with six key vitamins, essential for a healthy, vibrant glow.
If you want to know more…

This revolutionary, noncomedogenic treatment oil is powered by six key vitamins that synergistically target signs of aging, boost hydration, brighten skin, and defend from free radicals for a more youthful-looking complexion. The feather-light formula absorbs quickly for an instant dose of radiance while helping balance skin for a healthy, vibrant glow.

Vitamin A Improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, boosts firmness, evens tone and enhances radiance. Vitamin B is a moisturizing humectant that helps balance oil production and soothe. Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that evens tone, brightens, and protects against skin-aging free radicals. Vitamin D helps improve the skin’s barrier while shielding against UV damage. Vitamin E intercepts free radicals to prevent skin damage as it softens. Vitamin F helps improve texture and barrier function.
What else you need to know:

"Applying vitamins topically is just as important as taking a daily multi-vitamin supplement. Certain vitamins need one another to reach maximum potency. That’s why I wanted to formulate a treatment oil with six key vitamins that would deliver six key benefits for total skin rejuvenation. The result is Multi-Vitamin Infusion Oil, a potent blend of vitamins A, B, C, D, E, and F. This noncomedogenic treatment oil for all skin types helps activate recovery where skin needs it."—Dr. Murad
Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin.

ingredients:
Argania Spinosa (Argan)
Kernel Oil*, CBD Rich Hemp Extract**.
*Organic. **Naturally-Derived.
CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:

1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive. 
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants* 
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.  
 

Fine print:

-Full-spectrum CBD:
 Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids. 
-Broad-spectrum CBD:
 Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids. 
-CBD Isolate:
 A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included. 
-Testing:
 Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

name: SKINPOWER Airy Milky Lotion
about the product: An airy, light moisturizer that absorbs quickly to boost skin’s bounciness and suppleness for a more youthful, healthy look.
Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

- Pitera™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids to condition skin's natural functions.

- InfinitPower Technology: An exclusive cocktail of power ingredients formulated with calla lily extract, dokudami extract, and peony extract to charge the power source of skin to visibly plump up from within.
What Else You Need to Know:

Airy Milky Lotion is a pioneering skincare solution leveraging dynamics of skin power to recharge skin for a more youthful, healthy look. With InfinitPower Technology, skin is not only continuously moisturized but is visibly plumped from within*, restoring a bouncy, supple appearance.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

name: pores no more® Mattifying Hydrator Pore Minimizing Gel
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A lightweight gel that simultaneously mattifies and hydrates for up to eight hours while minimizing the appearance of pores.
If you want to know more…
Skin has a matte finish that feels soft and hydrated for up to 8 hours, and pores look instantly smaller. With regular use, pores are less clogged and skin is less shiny.
What else you need to know:

Erase shine while keeping skin hydrated with this light, refreshing gel. It contains a smart sponge polysaccharide that's able to distinguish between sebum and water, so it pulls oil from the skin while leaving hydration levels intact. Its light-diffusing powders blur pores for a smooth, fresh finish. Long-term, botanical extracts from blue iris and willow bark purify and clean out pores while silica microsponges prevent pore walls from getting slack (one reason they look larger).
What else you need to know:

Don't trust the natural instinct to soak up oil with gobs of drying products when you have shiny skin. Stripping skin of all moisture actually revs oil production, worsening breakouts and further clogging pores.
ingredients: -Smart Sponge Polysaccharide: Pulls oil from the skin while leaving hydration levels intact.

-Light-Diffusing Powders: Instantly blur the look of pores and imperfections.

name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Irritation
about the product: A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Irritation that addresses skin concerns your way.
- Lactobacillus Probiotic Ferment: Helps to support skin’s natural defenses against external stressors to help keep skin in balance.
What Else You Need to Know:

This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base, then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern, and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience.

Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones, but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones, you’ll see a hint of tint, on others, a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.

name: Lotus Youth Preserve Radiance Lotion
about the product:
What it is:
A lightweight daily formula that instantly illuminates the complexion while delivering 24-hour moisture for a radiant, youthful glow.

What it is formulated to do:
This fast-absorbing lotion is formulated with Fresh’s Super 7 Complex, which is specifically designed to minimize and prevent visible signs of aging, deliver intense hydration, and boost radiance. The formula also contains star fruit extract, which helps preserve and protect the skin from accelerated signs of aging caused by free radicals. Super 7 Complex is a hydrating and radiance-boosting blend of seven supercharged ingredients that promote a youthful-looking complexion (lotus flower extract, blue-green algae extract, hibiscus fruit extract, fig fruit extract, vitamins C and E, and vegetable glycerol), while star fruit extract is proven to protect the skin from free radical damage, improving elasticity and reducing early signs of aging.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates 
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
“The lotus has been cultivated in eastern Asia for over 3,000 years. The plant is considered sacred in many cultures, but I especially love the way the Buddhists regard it. They believe that it is the ultimate symbol of complete purification, as it journeys through water to rise above the surface and blossom into a stunning flower.”—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder  

Research results:
After an independent consumer testing panel used Lotus Youth Preserve Radiance Lotion with Super 7 Complex:
- Provides 24-hour hydration
- 57% improved moisture levels 
- 45% improved radiance
- 40% improved skin brightness
- 100% felt their skin was protected
- 97% noticed improved skin tone and healthier-looking skin
- 94% reported hydrated, softer, more supple, revitalized skin
- 94% said their skin elasticity was improved
- 91% noticed more luminous, radiant, and smoother skin
- 88% reported youthful-looking skin
ingredients:

-Star Fruit Extract: Proven to protect the skin from free radical damage, improving elasticity and reducing early signs of aging.

name: Age Defense BB Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 30
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A powerful balm to perfect the appearance of skin.
What it is formulated to do:
- Antioxidants to prevent and banish imperfections

This instant morning routine gives skin just about everything it needs for a quick start: SPF protection, antioxidants for prevention, and just enough coverage to banish imperfections. In addition to these beneficial factors, it makes the perfect primer, too.
What else you need to know:

Beauty Balms or BB Creams were originally developed as a perfect post-procedure cream used to treat, hydrate, prime, protect, and camouflage the skin. Great for all skin types including those with sensitive skin, these versatile “five-in-one” formulas are designed to do it all: treat with high levels of active skin care ingredients; moisturize and smooth dehydrated skin; prime and perfect skin’s surface; camouflage and color correct the skintone; and protect skin from the sun with SPF. They can be used as a last step for their skin care benefits or used on their own as an instant beautifier.

Complexions with very fair to pink undertones, use Shade 01. Very fair, moderately fair, and golden undertones, use Shade 02. Moderately fair to medium complexions with golden undertones, use Shade 03. Golden to deeper skin tones, use Shade 04.

name: Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An oil-based cleanser that gently melts away makeup and impurities on the skin’s surface.
If you want to know more…

SK-II Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil is a clear, purifying facial cleanser that conditions the skin while dissolving impurities on the skin’s surface, including makeup, sunscreen, dirt, and pollution. When emulsified with water, this cleansing oil lifts and locks onto hidden sebum and impurities, gently removing them from skin. Formulated with wild rose extract, apple seed extract, and SK-II’s signature ingredient, Pitera™, this oil-based cleanser provides an effective, yet delicate, wash, melting away even the toughest waterproof makeup and keeping skin smooth and hydrated.
What else you need to know:

Double cleansing is a unique Asian beauty skincare practice that is quickly gaining popularity in the Western world. This two-step process is the most effective way to completely wash your face of all impurities, and is key to getting the most out of your skincare routine. Start with an oil-based cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil, to lift away all impurities on the skin’s surface. Follow with a cream or foam cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleanser (sold separately), to remove any additional dirt, oil, and dead skin cells.
This product is fragrance-free and colorant-free. It contains no GMOs, and is not tested on animals.

name: Premier Cru Anti-Aging Precious Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A luxurious and nourishing facial oil that instantly leaves a healthy, dewy glow while correcting all signs of aging, both day and night.
If you want to know more…

Like applying silk to the skin, this luxurious, custom-made oil not only feels indulgent but also actively fights dehydration, fine lines, and dull skin. The quick-absorbing formula imparts an instant, dewy radiance as Caudalie’s signature powerhouse patents visibly restore all signs of aging: resveratrol lifts and firms, Viniferine® brightens, and grape seed polyphenols protect against environmental aggressors. A cocktail of sustainably sourced, skin-fortifying oils—grape, sandalwood, jojoba, coriander, and prickly pair—additionally help to nourish, smooth, tighten, and brighten. The oil literally melts into the skin, leaving behind a silky finish. Skin is soft, smooth, and gorgeously glowing—prepped and ready for makeup or any next step. It has a natural scent of roses that are soaked in Caudalie's family vineyard oak barrel.

Vinotherapist (aka Caudalie spa aesthetician) tip: blend a few drops of your Premier Cru the Precious Oil with any foundation for an anti-aging blend that will make complexion instantly shine. Another tip is to blend Premier Cru the Precious Oil with any body lotion for additional nourishment and full body anti-aging.
What else you need to know:

Founded on their family vineyard in Bordeaux France, Mathilde and Bertrand Thomas created the first skincare brand to harness the natural antioxidant powers of the grapevine. Since the beginning, the 100 percent family-owned company has always sourced natural and environmentally conscious ingredients, while collaborating with leading medical schools such as Harvard Medical School. Each formula created is held to the highest of standards: natural, effective, and luxurious free of synthetic and harmful ingredients—with no animal testing. Caudalie never uses parabens, phenoxyethenol, phtalates, mineral oil, sodium laureth sulfate, or animal ingredients in their formulas.
In a clinical study/self-evaluation on 22 volunteers after 28 days of use:
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!

-Grape Seed Oil: Nourishes without feeling greasy.

name: Omega Hydrating Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A concentrated, water-free facial oil infused with 10 percent ferment complex that delivers both intense hydration and moisturizing benefits for a smoother, suppler appearance.
If you want to know more…

This lightweight, balancing oil delivers essential hydration, polyphenols, and antioxidants to the skin, promoting a softer, healthier-looking complexion for all skin types. Formulated with 10 percent ferment complex, this nourishing blend of fermented oils including argan, olive, shiunko, and licorice helps lock in moisture, softening the look of fine lines and leaving the skin with a dewy glow. Packed with omega fatty acids 3, 6, and 9, the advanced formula absorbs quickly, improving the appearance of skin elasticity and suppleness. Tumeric minimize the look of redness and works together with chlorophyllin-copper complex to help refine the look of pores and improve the appearance of skin texture.
What else you need to know:

Dr. Lancer developed Omega Hydrating Oil with fermented oils, prized due their higher antioxidant and free fatty acid content over other oils. The fermentation process breaks down the oils into smaller molecules, decreasing surface tension and producing enzymes, polysaccharides and lipids beneficial to the skin. This process also allows for improved absorption and spreadability, thereby giving Omega Hydrated Oil its silky, non-greasy finish.

The go-to dermatologist for an impressive roster of A-list clients, Dr. Harold Lancer created Lancer Skincare so that everyone can achieve the Lancer glow at home. Using his unrivaled clinical experience, Dr. Lancer formulated a line of advanced, targeted treatments to further enhance the results of The Method, his signature regimen of daily exfoliation, cleansing and nourishing the skin to reveal healthy, radiant skin. With an active patient base of 30,000, Dr. Lancer sees as many as 60 patients a day from across the globe at the Lancer Dermatology Clinic in Beverly Hills.
This product is a NEWBEAUTY Best of the Best 2019 Award Winner for Best Face Oil.

Hops relaxes and has a general sedative quality for which hops essential oil is famous is also why it is commonly used by people suffering from anxiety and mood swings, as it can help to settle stormy minds and calm the body.

What it is:

 A 24-hour makeup setting mist that hydrates while giving skin a fresh, dewy glow.

name: Counter Balance™ Oil Control Hydrator
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A lightweight, mattifying hydrator with potent active botanicals and powerful AHAs to reduce oil and minimize the appearance of pores, and improve the wear of foundation.
If you want to know more…

This innovative moisturizer is powered by Green Fusion Complex™, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals with natural antiseptic properties. Combined with neem seed oil and powerful AHAs, it helps keep pores clear and skin matte all day long while maintaining optimal hydration and a healthy balance. Developed as the product Ole Henriksen wishes he had during his own struggle with oily skin, this lightweight, mattifying hydrator gives oily and combination skin types essential moisture to look its healthy best.

This groundbreaking formula also significantly improves the wear of foundation for up to eight hours, making makeup meltdown a thing of the past. The complexion is soft, smooth, and refreshed with a healthy-looking, matte glow.
What else you need to know:

Ole was inspired to dedicate his life to cosmetic chemistry after seeing his own oily problem skin transform with proper care. He created this mattifying hydrator to address the common fear that moisturizing already oily skin may cause additional breakouts. This hydrator features Ole Henriksen’s Green Fusion Complex™, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals—including green tea, eucalyptus, algae (kelp), and Irish moss extracts—with natural antiseptic properties to help absorb excess oil and refine pores.

name: Pure Nilotica Melt Nourishing Balm-to-Oil
about the product: A multitasker that nourishes skin, addresses visible imperfections, and smooths complexion‘s appearance.
Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.
What Else You Need to Know:

The Pure Nilotica Melt Nourishing Balm-To-Oil is an ultra-hydrating balm-to-oil made from one ingredient: Nilotica Reserve™. The texture naturally starts as a luxuriously rich butter that melts quickly when smoothed onto the skin. It delivers vitamins A and E, powerful antioxidants, allantoin, and 25 percent more essential fatty acids compared to traditional shea to hydrate, brighten, and plump the look of skin. Nilotica is harvested from trees that grow wild at the source of the Nile River in East Africa and its nuts are cold pressed to preserve the raw and potent properties of LXMI‘s signature ingredient, Nilotica Reserve™.

LXMI sources Nilotica Reserve™ from fair-trade, women‘s cooperatives in the Nile Valley, paying three times the local wage as a means of alleviating global poverty and preserving the local biodiversity to fight climate change. LXMI is the next level for modern consumers to do good through daily skincare habits.

 An intensely nourishing night cream (or mask) that deeply moisturizes, soothes redness and irritation, and boosts firmness and elasticity.

- Dryness
- Redness

If you want to know more…
 This luxurious night cream repairs, rejuvenates, and nourishes skin with wildcrafted botanicals. Shea and cocoa butters work to moisturize and support natural collagen production, vitamin E promotes healing and cellular turnover, B vitamins work to soothe redness and inflammation, and lemon aspen enhances firmness and elasticity. An abundance of antioxidants—including vitamin C—from pomegranate and acai fight free radicals and deliver a brightening, youth-boosting action. Plus, it’s divinely scented with coconut and rose for an ultra-pampering experience. 

What else you need to know:
 This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding. 
Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.
Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits. 

Clean at Sephora

Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.

name: Volcanic Elixir Polynesian Beauty Oil
about the product: A hydrating overnight treatment oil to nourish and condition skin, with a powerful key ingredient extracted from the nut kernels of the tamanu fruit.

When used as an overnight hydration treatment, Volcanic Elixir works while you sleep. It delivers rich hydration, conditions damaged skin, soothes acne-prone skin, and helps improve the look of the overall skin complexion.

This elixir is rich in antioxidant and skin-calming properties, making it ideal for conditioning dry skin and eczema. The naturally earthy aroma of the tamanu oil explodes in the Volcanic Elixir as it's unmasked by filler ingredients or artificial fragrances. It's 100-percent real, raw, and natural.

This Polynesian beauty oil is extracted from the nut kernels of the tamanu fruit—which flourishes in the islands of the South Pacific, thanks to the volcanic atmosphere there. Not only does volcanic ash provide nutrients to surrounding soil, but it also contains minerals that are beneficial to plants. Due to this very reason, the tamanu oil originating from Polynesia contains the highest nutritional value.
Volcanic Elixir can also be used on the face or body as a daily moisturizer.

CBD and five ceramides nourish skin while hyaluronic acid replenishes moisture.

CBD at Sephora Standards Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.
